section.title: otrs.com
section.para: The OTRS website with source code, documentation and news is available at http://www.otrs.com/. Here you can also find information about commercial services and trainings from OTRS Group, the creator of OTRS.

section.title: Online API Library
section.para: The OTRS developer API documentation is available at http://otrs.github.io/doc/api/otrs/stable/.

section.title: Developer Mailing List
section.para: The OTRS developer mailing list is available at http://lists.otrs.org/.
